page.title: 10Motels - Paignton
page.content: Torbay Chalet Motel offers full board and can hold 570 people. A guide took us around the camp and we realised that there were many sports facilities available e.g. snooker, tennis, table tennis, football, volleyball, putting, trampolining and a 3m deep swimming pool. The adventure playground, though small had cost Â£20,000. There are 168 chalets and 104 staff. The camp also includes a ballroom, bar, cafe,and television lounge. Asked why they came to the Torbay Chalet Motel some old age pensioners said that they had come with a club whilst a young couple said that it was in a brochure. A family said that they could recommend it. The Motel put on events such as Glamourous Grannys, Knobbly Knees etc. Most people agreed that they were having an enjoyable time.
